content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This policy provides Medicare Part B requirements for select pharmacy dispensing and billing activities.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1. Purpose\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The purpose of this policy is to set forth Walgreens requirements regarding the dispensing and submission of claims for reimbursement of Medicare Part B-covered pharmacy products and health care services to ensure compliance with relevant laws and regulations, including the U.S. Anti-Kickback Statute, U.S. False Claims Act, and Medicare regulations and program requirements.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2. Scope\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This policy applies to all Walgreens Team Members in the U.S., Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands and all other U.S. territories as well as third-party contractors or agents performing services on behalf of Walgreens, involving requirements described within this policy.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3. individual who is authorized to prescribe, dispense, or administer Walgreens pharmacy or \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"medical products, or who is in a position to influence the purchasing, prescribing, dispensing, or use of Walgreens pharmacy or medical products. This includes clinical and non-clinical individuals (e.g., surgeons and hospital administrators) who make or have influence on product-related decisions, as well as administrative and other personnel acting on behalf of, or as an agent or contractor of, the HCP, and all people who are part of the care team or are involved with the referral process (e.g., social workers, case managers referral coordinators).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Nurse practitioners and physician assistants who work at a retail health care clinic located in a Walgreens store and any other HCPs who work in a Walgreens store but are not Walgreens Team Members, such as opticians and optometrists.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Identified Overpayment\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A payment amount received by Walgreens from a Health Care Payor or patient which Walgreens (1) after applicable reconciliation, determines that it was not entitled by law or contract to receive and retain; and (2) has quantified.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Manufacturer-issued Savings Card\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A card provided by a pharmaceutical manufacturer to eligible patients to reduce patient Out-of-Pocket Expenses for the manufacturer’s drug.
